results.title: Euglycemic diabetic ketoacidosis caused by canagliflozin: a case report
results.text_hl: A 71-year-old female who was being treated for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Canagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068896 @@@canagliflozin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_saxagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C502994 @@@saxagliptin@@@ orally presented to the @DISEASE_Emergencies @DISEASE_MESH:D004630 @@@ED@@@ for evaluation of reduced @<m>DISEASE_Avoidant_Restrictive_Food_Intake_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000080146 @@@oral intake@@@, malaise, @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, and @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@.

citations.NLM: Fukuda M, Nabeta M, Muta T, Fukami K, Takasu O. Euglycemic diabetic ketoacidosis caused by canagliflozin: a case report Int J Emerg Med. 2020 Jan 22;13(1):2. PMID: 31969112
citations.BibTeX: @article{31969112, title={Euglycemic diabetic ketoacidosis caused by canagliflozin: a case report}, author={Fukuda M and Nabeta M and Muta T and Fukami K and Takasu O}, journal={Int J Emerg Med}, volume={13}, number={1}, pages={2}}
